医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
地中海饮食显示出缓解牛皮癣，痤疮和Hidradenitis purativa的希望最近的评论强调了地中海饮食如何通过调节关键的炎症途径并支持代谢健康，如何减少牛皮癣，痤疮和Hidradenitis compurativa等慢性皮肤状况的炎症并改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/mediterranean-diet-shows-promise-in--en-easing-psoriasis-acne-acne-acne-ancne-ancne-ancne-and-hidradenitis-subpurativa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/mediterranean-diet-shows-promise-in---------acne-psoriasis-acne-acne-ancne-ancne-ancne-ancne-and-hidradenitis-suppurativa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfe62a57-2623-4406-b813-3ffb971da0fd Wed, 19 Mar 2025 23:48:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet shows promise in easing psoriasis, acne, and hidradenitis suppurativa
吃更多的水果和蔬菜可能有助于防止老年人跌倒，尤其是女性水果和蔬菜摄入量不足可显着增加老年人，尤其是在患有认知，情感和睡眠/能量的女性中，作为部分介体的女性，有害的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/eating-more-fruits-and-vegetables-may-help-prevent-falp-prevent-falls-falls-nolder-inold-inold-Adults-特别是women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/eating-more-fruits-and-wegetables-may-help-prevent-prevent-falls-falls-nolder-inold-inlder-Adults-特别是women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6247f6666666666666666665-41fc-9873-e7261cdbbb Wed, 19 Mar 2025 23:06:00 -0400 Eating more fruits and vegetables may help prevent falls in older adults, especially women
独特形状的磁性纳米颗粒在癌症治疗中提供突破根据俄勒冈州立大学的研究人员的说法，新的磁性纳米颗粒形状夹在两个金字塔之间的立方体代表了治疗卵巢肿瘤以及可能其他类型的癌症的突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/niquely-shate-magnetic-nanoparticles offer-break break throughthough-in-cancer-incancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/niquely-shape-magnetic-nanoparticles-offer-break-breakthrough-incancer-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f9ACC1B-6EC6-4C03-BEA3-CE35A9315D2C Wed, 19 Mar 2025 22:31:51 -0400 Uniquely-shaped magnetic nanoparticles offer breakthrough in cancer therapy
早期甜食不塑造幼儿的饮食 - 家庭餐更重要互补喂养期间的早期甜味暴露并不能影响儿童以后的饮食味道模式。取而代之的是，更广泛的环境因素（例如家庭饮食习惯）起着更重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/early-sweet-foods-done28099t-shape-toddlerse28099-diets-e28094---e28094------e28094-family-family-more-more.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/early-sweet-foods-done28099t-shape-toddlerse28099-diets-e28094---e28094-family-more-more.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95139EB2-66A0-410D-A326-E87F75B116AA Wed, 19 Mar 2025 22:20:00 -0400 Early sweet foods don’t shape toddlers’ diets — family meals matter more
草莓可以增强脑速度和心脏健康，但认知益处仍然不清楚草莓可能会适度提高加工速度并降低老年人的收缩压，但它们并不能显着改善总体认知功能或血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/strawberries-enhance-enhance-brain-speed-shealt-and-and-health-health-health-nealth-cognative-benefits-remain-unclear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/strawberries-enhance-enhance-brain-speed-shealt-and-helth-health-health-nealth-cognative-benefits-remain-unclear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd4Adcf5-434A-4FB4-9610-781C03E95931 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:55:00 -0400 Strawberries enhance brain speed and heart health, but cognitive benefits remain unclear
实验药物表明有望降低阿尔茨海默氏症相关痴呆的风险根据由奈特家族（Knight Family）主导的一项研究的研究结果，一种实验性药物似乎降低了注定要在30年代，40年代或50年代发展该疾病的人中与阿尔茨海默氏症相关的痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/experiment-drug-shows-promise-in-romise-in-reducing-rescing-risk-of-alzheimers-与dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/Experimental-drug-shows-promise-in-reducing-risk-of-Alzheimers-related-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7f1eb1b-8578-4494-4494-ad69-d69-d4e1c6d1ad20 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:30:08 -0400 Experimental drug shows promise in reducing risk of Alzheimer's-related dementia
研究确定了癫痫中对单词记忆至关重要的大脑区域记住单词所需的大脑部分，以及它们如何受到癫痫的常见形式的影响，已由UCL的神经科医生和神经外科医生团队确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-istifies-brain-areas-areas-crucial-for-for-word-word-memory-in-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-indistifies-brain-areas-areas-cucial-for-word-word-memory-in-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1B753E98-24B0-43E5-ABE0-5E3760731EE1 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:24:48 -0400 Study identifies brain areas crucial for word memory in epilepsy
大麻二醇配方的突破可以改善癫痫和MS的治疗南澳大利亚大学的科学家提出了一种创新的解决方案，以提高大麻二酚治疗癫痫，多发性硬化症和其他神经退行性疾病的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/breakthrough-in-cannabidiol-formulation--reatment-foreatment-for--woreatment-for-epilepsy-and-ms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/breakthrough-in-cannabidiol-formulation-ramproulation-reatment-for-for-for--woreatment-for-epilepsy-and-ms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07E2EC2D-AEB1-4364-92AC-94B385EFE354 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:19:05 -0400 Breakthrough in cannabidiol formulation improves treatment for epilepsy and MS
共享餐点的人报告了更高的生活满意度和福祉与他人共享更多进餐时间的人更有可能报告更高水平的生活满意度和福祉，这是由UCL学者领导的《世界幸福报告》的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/people-who-share-meals-report-reater-life-life-satefaction-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/people-who-no-share-meals-report-greater-life-life-life-satefaction-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30BCF692-CD37-4B72-B780-09BA00DA0731 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:14:16 -0400 People who share meals report greater life satisfaction and wellbeing
针对“信号干扰器”蛋白的靶向抑制可能会改善肿瘤对免疫疗法的反应靶向抑制“信号干扰器”蛋白可以改善肿瘤对免疫疗法的反应。一项新的研究在自然界发表，展示了一些癌细胞如何使用蛋白质电压依赖性阴离子通道2（VDAC2），例如信号干扰器，以防止人体的抗癌系统与免疫系统通信。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/targeted-indimented-of-a-a-signal-jammer-protein-may-imbrove-tumor-tumor-tumor-tumor-respons-to-to-to-to-momunother.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/targeted-indimented-of-a-a-signal-jammer-protein-may-imbrove-tumor-tumor-tumor-respons-to-soppons-to-soppons-to-momunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7a4d7d1-f512-40c2-40c2-873f-8cca2d6395e2 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 21:01:51 -0400 Targeted inhibition of a 'signal jammer' protein may improve tumor response to immunotherapy
